com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.tone_analyzer.v3.model

Class SentenceTone

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.model.GenericModel
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.tone_analyzer.v3.model.ElementTone
        • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.tone_analyzer.v3.model.SentenceTone

  • public class SentenceTone
extends ElementTone
    This element contains the result of analyzing an individual sentence. It contains a list of ToneCategory objects which is the actual result, and also some metadata about the sentence: The original text (if it needs to be tracked back), and the position of the sentence in the original text (as index of first and last character).
